Name: Soul Nomad & the World Eaters
About the game: Gig and the gang are back to spread destruction! Utilize customizable “Rooms” to assemble and experiment with different team builds with over 25 different unit types such as Knight, Archer, Nereid, and Griphos Knight. Make impactful choices that change the outcome of the story, scout out battle conditions prior to combat, and even kidnap or do battle with the townsfolk! The World Eaters Return Carve a path to glory with the first release of Soul Nomad since its debut in 2007, and experience the in-depth gameplay and captivating story of the original on a modern platform.
